i was born under a blood moon.

participant_2.background:
I don't go to Comic Con, but I like to run and drink chai tea.
I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it.
I am a gummy worm maker, and I love my job!
I've been enjoying my new hobbies of rock collecting and macaroni art.
I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.

content.text: I am not a big fan of comic con either. What are your other hobbies besides running and drinking tea?
My favorite hobby is making music. I play the guitar and write my own songs.
That's really cool! I always wanted to play an instrument but I never had the time or patience to learn how.
It's never too late to start! I took lessons when I was younger, but I really got serious about it when I was in college.
Do you perform your music anywhere?
I used to play at open mics a lot, but now I just play for fun.
I am glad you still enjoy it. I have always been more of a listener.
That's totally fine! I love listening to music too. It's one of my favorite ways to relax.
What are some of your favorite bands or artists?
I like a lot of different types of music, but my favorite bands are probably the Beatles, Nirvana, and Radiohead.
I love the Beatles! They are one of my favorite bands too.
They are so great! Their music has stood the test of time.
What's your favorite song by them?
I have a lot of favorite Beatles songs, but I think "In My Life" is probably my favorite
